summary: This document outlines restrictions on the operational use of certain categories of individuals by the DDO. It details prohibitions and policy restrictions based on U.S. Governmental directives, agency agreements, and the DDO's risk assessments. It includes guidelines for approval procedures when using individuals from sensitive categories, such as members of ACTION, Fulbright grantees, media employees, and foreign nationals.
title: RESTRICTIONS ON OPERATIONAL USE OF CERTAIN CATEGORIES OF INDIVIDUALS
